mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Voice of Prince Edward County, Vol. ?, No. 5
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Miller Gives Away Thousands - Author Unknown - Dr. N. P. Miller donates $10,000 to Howard University School of Denistry. / "Red Cross: Part of Conspiracy?" - Author Unknown - The author questions whether the Red Cross is purposefully conspiring to keep the Black community from accessing swimming lessons. / "We Believe" - Author Unknown - The paper emphasizes that it is a voice for the Black community and dedicated to spreading the truth. / "Buildings or People?" - Author Unknown - Longwood's expansion into the predominantly Black neighborhoods leads to houses of the poor being torn down. / "What's in a Bad Name?" - Author Unknown - Farmville Baptist Church is chastised for not allowing five men into the building because one was black. / "Motto of Longwood College: 'We Teach to Teach'" - Author Unknown - Longwood College is sinking into the mire of its own indifference to the stench of the world.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Various Contributors
Aphonso Vance White, editor
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African American newspapers
Associations, institutions, etc.—African American membership
Race discrimination—United States
Prince Edward County (Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The Voice of Prince Edward County
